## ThemeLoadOptions interface

Options to customize \[\[Theme\]\] loading process.

 \[\[ThemeLoader.load\]\]

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ThemeLoadOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [logger](./harp-mapview.themeloadoptions.logger.md) | [ISimpleChannel](./harp-utils.isimplechannel.md) | Custom logging channel on which diagnostics and warnings will be reported.<!-- -->If not specified, \[\[ThemeLoader.load\]\] will log to <code>console</code>. |
|  [maxInheritanceDepth](./harp-mapview.themeloadoptions.maxinheritancedepth.md) | number | Maximum recursion depth when resolving base themes through \[\[\[Theme\]\]s <code>extends</code> property. \[\[DEFAULT\_MAX\_THEME\_INTHERITANCE\_DEPTH\]\] |
|  [resolveDefinitions](./harp-mapview.themeloadoptions.resolvedefinitions.md) | boolean | Whether to resolve <code>ref</code> expressions in <code>definition</code> and <code>styles</code> elements. <code>false</code>, as datasources resolve definitions in \[\[StyleSetEvaluator\]\]. |
|  [resolveIncludeUris](./harp-mapview.themeloadoptions.resolveincludeuris.md) | boolean | Resolve the URIs of inherited themes (using <code>extends</code> feature). If true, \[\[uriResolver\]\] will be used to resolve the URI  true |
|  [resolveResourceUris](./harp-mapview.themeloadoptions.resolveresourceuris.md) | boolean | Resolve the URIs to resources like fonts, icons, ... If true, \[\[uriResolver\]\] will be used to resolve the URI  true |
|  [signal](./harp-mapview.themeloadoptions.signal.md) | AbortSignal | An <code>AbortSignal</code> object instance; allows you to communicate with a loading process (including fetch requests) request and abort it if desired via an <code>AbortController</code>.<!-- -->Modeled after Web APIs <code>fetch</code>s <code>init.signal</code>. https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope/fetch  https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/AbortController |
|  [uriResolver](./harp-mapview.themeloadoptions.uriresolver.md) | [UriResolver](./harp-utils.uriresolver.md) | Resolve asset <code>URI</code>s referenced in <code>Theme</code> assets using this resolver. |
